content:
* For a period of coverage not exceeding 7 months, the premium refund is 20.00% of the annual premium.
* For a period of coverage not exceeding 8 months, the premium refund is 12.50% of the annual premium.
* For a period of coverage exceeding 8 months, the premium refund is 0.00% of the annual premium.
questions: What is the premium refund percentage if the coverage period does not exceed 7 months?
How much premium refund can one expect for a coverage period not exceeding 8 months?
Is there any premium refund available if the coverage period exceeds 8 months?
What happens to the premium refund if I cancel my policy after 8 months?
Can I get a 20% refund on my annual premium if I cancel within 7 months?
What is the maximum refund percentage available for cancelling the insurance policy?
How does the premium refund percentage change as the coverage period increases?
What is the refund policy for a coverage period of exactly 8 months?
Is it possible to receive any premium refund after 9 months of coverage?
What are the conditions for receiving a 12.50% refund on the annual premium?
